content:
# I have successfully harvested 10 copper ore, and my inventory now contains:
# - 5 wood
# - 5 stone
# - 10 copper ore
# - 3 iron plates
# - 1 iron gear wheel

# Now that I have copper ore, I will insert it into the stone furnace to begin the smelting process for copper plates.

# Insert the copper ore into the stone furnace.
insert_item(Prototype.CopperOre, target=stone_furnace_entity, quantity=10)

# I will then check the status of the stone furnace to ensure it is processing the copper ore.
print(f"Stone furnace status: {get_entity_status(stone_furnace_entity)}")

# After confirming that the furnace is working, I will wait for the smelting to complete.
for _ in range(30):  # Maximum 30 seconds wait.
    current_inventory = inspect_inventory(stone_furnace_entity)
    if current_inventory.get(Prototype.CopperPlate, 0) >= 3:  # Wait until we have 3 copper plates.
        break
    sleep(1)
else:
    raise Exception("Smelting timeout for copper ore - please check resources.")

# Once the smelting is complete, I will extract the copper plates.
extracted_copper_plates = extract_item(Prototype.CopperPlate, position=stone_furnace_entity.position, quantity=3)

# Finally, I will check my updated inventory after extracting the copper plates.
print(f"Inventory after extracting copper plates: {inspect_inventory()}")
